selections.name: Equitable
selections.reason: Resuming after a solid campaign where he wasn't far away at Scone. The 4th place finish last start was full of merit and he looks the class runner in this field.

selections.name: Parissident
selections.reason: Resuming here. Has placed 5 times and draws a soft gate. Should get a lovely run in transit and be in the finish.

selections.name: He'sthechief
selections.reason: Has race fitness on his side. Effort at Scone was okay and he can improve here.

selections.name: Jukebox Edition
selections.reason: Experienced campaigner who can pop up for a place in this grade.

danger_horse.name: Parissident
danger_horse.reason: Fresh record suggests she will be competitive and the low draw is a big advantage.

selections.name: Feared
selections.reason: Resuming. Placed at Kembla Grange last prep behind Master Of The Air. That form is superior to this country maiden field. Looks the winner.

selections.name: Smashing Nova
selections.reason: Consistent type who ran a solid 2nd at Taree last start. Will be thereabouts again.

selections.name: Spot On The Moon
selections.reason: Great debut 3rd at Grafton. Will take plenty of improvement from that run.

selections.name: Be Guided
selections.reason: Has placed at this track before. Draws well and can sneak into the minors.

danger_horse.name: Smashing Nova
danger_horse.reason: Race fit and knocking on the door for a win.

selections.name: Kirkall
selections.reason: Kris Lees trainee who ran a solid 3rd at Taree last start. Steps up to 1400m which should suit. The one to beat.

selections.name: Burn Bobby Burn
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed ability in Victoria last prep. Watch betting market closely.

selections.name: Always A Rainbow
selections.reason: Improved effort to run 2nd at this track and distance last start. Must be respected.

selections.name: Literature Tycoon
selections.reason: Resuming. Has contested stronger races. Draws the rail and gets a jockey upgrade.

danger_horse.name: Burn Bobby Burn
danger_horse.reason: New stable could see improvement and previous form is good enough for this.

selections.name: Fulmen Filou
selections.reason: Coming off a win at Grafton. Carries weight but is the class runner of the field. Hard to go past.

selections.name: Final Impact
selections.reason: Ran a good 2nd at Dubbo last time out. Honest stay who will run the trip right out.

selections.name: Eject
selections.reason: Finished 4th behind Fulmen Filou last start. Meets him better at the weights here.

selections.name: Wolf Club
selections.reason: Drop in class from Newcastle. Can improve sharply in this company despite the wide draw.

danger_horse.name: Final Impact
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and fit. Will make the favorite earn it.

selections.name: Taipan Legend
selections.reason: Won well at this track and distance last start. Loves the Tamworth mile and draws perfectly to repeat.

selections.name: Fiorsum Fred
selections.reason: Solid 3rd at Newcastle in better grade. The clear danger to the top pick.

selections.name: Pensativa
selections.reason: Drops significantly in grade from Rosehill. Draws soft and should be competitive.

selections.name: Zamborghini
selections.reason: Has ability but the draw is tricky. Place chance if he gets luck.

danger_horse.name: Fiorsum Fred
danger_horse.reason: Provincial form stacks up well here.

selections.name: Master Gee
selections.reason: Coming off a win at Armidale. Consistent galloper who maps well from barrier 3.

selections.name: African Diamond
selections.reason: Runner-up at Gunnedah last start. Racing well and looks a major player.

selections.name: Brighella
selections.reason: Won at this track last start. Steps up in grade but is in winning form.

selections.name: Lord Of The Sun
selections.reason: Can improve on recent efforts. Good draw.

danger_horse.name: African Diamond
danger_horse.reason: Honest mare who rarely runs a bad race.

selections.name: Grandini
selections.reason: Drops from Highway class. Form prior was solid. Wide gate is the concern but has the ability.

selections.name: Bolt Away Now
selections.reason: Another dropping from Highway grade. Won at Inverell prior. Big chance.

selections.name: It's A Written
selections.reason: Placed at this track last start. Consistent and draws well.

selections.name: Halo Phenomena
selections.reason: Has ability but the barrier is a horror show. Will need a brilliant ride.

selections.name: Cumboogle
selections.reason: Won well at Parkes. Proven weight carrier and loves the 1000m dash.

selections.name: Beyond My Ken
selections.reason: Won at Scone last start. Racing in career best form.

selections.name: This One Time
selections.reason: Won at this track/dist last start. Loves Tamworth.

selections.name: Tough Guy
selections.reason: Resuming. Trialled well and draws soft. Watch for market moves.
